text: Mostafa Marian (born July 21, 2004) is an Iranian para-athlete specializing in discus throw and shot put events. He has represented Iran in various international competitions, including the 2024 Summer Paralympics. == Career == Marian began his athletic career in 2016, focusing on field events within para-athletics. He competed in the F56 classification and participated in international competitions such as the World Para Athletics Grand Prix and the 2024 Summer Paralympics in Paris. == Doping Violation == In December 2024, the International Paralympic Committee (IPC) announced that Marian received a three-year ban for an anti-doping rule violation. A urine sample collected out-of-competition on August 27, 2024, tested positive for methasterone, an anabolic steroid prohibited under the World Anti-Doping Agency (WADA) 2024 Prohibited List. Marian accepted the sanction, resulting in a suspension from August 31, 2024, to August 30, 2027. == References == == External links == * Mostafa Marian â€“ International Paralympic Committee
